page.title: 08LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Magistrates Courts meet in the Civic Centre.Offences in the area are dealt with by the Market Drayton bench of magistrates.Courts are held in Whitchurch on two alternate Mondays in each month.Cases in Whitchurch which need to be dealt with by Domestic and Juvenile Courts have to be referred to Market Drayton.Cases which cannot be dealt with by the local magistrates are sent for trial at Shrewsbury Crown Court.Both police and magistrates work closely with Social Services and the Probation Services.
